summary: On March 12, 1956, Basque Nationalist Jesús de Galíndez Suarez disappeared from his apartment in New York City, and was never heard from again. He had been working with the F.B.I., and was ... See full summary »
cast: Saffron Burrows|Harvey Keitel|Eduard Fernández|Guillermo Toledo|Reynaldo Miravalles|Joel Angelino|Jorge Alí|John Furey|Hugo Reyes|Mario Limonta|Chete Lera|Jacqueline Arenal|Miriam Learra|Carlos Padrón|Jorge Echemendía|Julio Antonio Quesada|Enrique Almirante|Fernando Echevarría|Txema Blasco|Amada Morado|Rolando Núñez|Ben Temple|Gérard Barray|Carmen Daisy|Alicia Agut|Reuben Thompson|Carlos Masola|Juan José Roig|Alberto Noel Pena|Mirelys Romero|Frank Artola|Sadeth Rumbaut|Luis Enrique Carreres|Rodolfo Faxa|Camila Mulkai|Julio Benitez Guardiola|Ann C. title: El misterio Galíndez
